setInertia(float) - Method in class org.world.agents.player.Player
Sets player's inertia After the player stops moving, it slides a certain distance proportional to the current inertia value If the given value is outside of the possible inertia range ( 6f to 30f) the value is set to the minimum or respectively maximum values Useful for making slippery surfaces in the game
